name: RoboBall (itch)
description:
Welcome to RoboBall!

Description

This is an infinite game where you must try to survive as long as possible from the waves of incoming enemies. See if you can beat your high score.

Controls

RoboBall uses a unique control system similar to golf games, where you can drag the mouse back and slingshot yourself through the air. It also has a combat system where you can only hurt enemies when you're at or above a certain speed. This will be indicated by your trail turning red.

Credits

The gameplay, art, and music are all made by me. The sound effects are generated off of a website called "jfxr."
